modName: TERA Armors for Skyrim - UNPB with BBP-TBBP
summary: UNP-BBP / TBBP armors from TERA Online
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/22023-1-1344970073.png[/img][/center]

[line]
[color=#CCCCCC]*** Disclaimer: The assets from TERA Online are used with the express permission of the En Masse Entertainment Public Relations Department. Click on the Permissions button above if you\'d like to review the email I received from En Masse.***[/color][line]

[size=5][color=#C6E2FF]QUICK FACTS:[/color][/size]
[color=red][size=4]1. THE REQUIREMENTS ARE [u]REQUIRED[/u]
2. CHEST PIECES WILL CRASH WITHOUT XPMS SKELETON
3. NOT LORE FRIENDLY
4. INTENTIONALLY NO BBP ON CERTAIN ARMORS (EX: STEEL BREASTPLATES)
5. NO OTHER BODY TYPES EVER* (CBBE, ADEC, LB, ETC)[/size][/color]
* This reflects my personal time commitment to this mod as creating armors with BBP support is a painstaking and exhausting process, and is not a statement of judgement regarding the quality of any body type.

[color=#C6E2FF][size=5]REQUIREMENTS:[/size][/color]
[size=4][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25846/]TERA Armors Collection for UNP[/url] - courtesy of asianboy345
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14899]UNP BLESSED BODY UNPB [u]WITH BBP[/u][/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/26800]XP32 Maximum skeleton XPMS[/url][/size]

[color=#C6E2FF][size=5]DESCRIPTION:[/size][/color]
This patches UNPB-BBP (optimized for TBBP) into the amazing TERA Armors Collection created by asianboy345.
The armors remain stand-alone and are fully craftable and enchantable.

[color=#C6E2FF][size=5]ARMOR LIST:[/size][/color][center][line]
[size=4]Light Armor:[/size]
[color=#CCFF99]Castanic Hunter (BBP)
Karassia (BBP)
Silver Spellsword (BBP)
-More Pending-[/color]

[size=4]Heavy Armor:[/size]
[color=#9966CC]Elven Inquisitor (non-BBP)
Trielek (BBP)
-More Pending-[/color]

[size=4]Robes:[/size]
[color=#FF99FF]White Mage (BBP)
-More Pending-
[/color][/center][line]

[color=#C6E2FF][size=5]UPDATES:[/size][/color]
To view the Change Log, click on the Version Number link (ex: 0.8.beta3) at the top.

[color=#C6E2FF][size=5]THANKS & ACKNOWLEDGEMENTS:[/size][/color]
Bethesda- Skyrim
En Masse Entertainment / Bluehole Studios - TERA Online
asianboy345 - the amazing TERA Armors Collection
Dimon99 - UNP Body that started it all!
CherryHotaling - kicking off BBP and writing a great tutorial about it
calyps - UNPB + BBP (my current favorite body)
xp32 - Creaing armors and animations like a boss
Nightasy - the single best armor tutorial guy! ([url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19249]Creating Custom Armors Step by Step by Nightasy[/url])
Sader325 - Elven Replacer helmet texture ([url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/5600]Mystic Elven Armor[/url])
author: Silver0236 and asianboy345
